verses.name: Jeremiah 23:34
verses.text: And as for the prophet, and the priest, and the people, that shall say, The burden of the Lord, I will even punish that man and his house.

verses.name: Jeremiah 23:35
verses.text: Thus shall ye say every one to his neighbour, and every one to his brother, What hath the Lord answered? and, What hath the Lord spoken?

verses.name: Jeremiah 23:36
verses.text: And the burden of the Lord shall ye mention no more: for every man’s word shall be his burden; for ye have perverted the words of the living God, of the Lord of hosts our God.
